import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../App.css' import data from "../data.json" import Image from '../assets/mercury.png' function Mercury() { let mercury = data[0] let [active, setActive] = useState({ background: `#419EBB`, border: 'none' }) // let [overview, setOverview] = useState(mercury.overview.content) let [structure, setStructure] = useState(mercury.structure.content) let [geology, setGeology] = useState(mercury.geology.content) let [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(mercury.overview) //img: setImg; let imageMap = { structure: "internal", geology: "geology", structure: "internal" } console.log(activeTab) function currentTab(tab) { setActiveTab(mercury[tab]) } return (

{mercury.name}

{activeTab.content}

Source: Wikipedia

ROTATION TIME

{mercury.rotation}

REVOLUTION TIME

{mercury.revolution}

RADIUS

{mercury.radius}

AVERAGE TEMP.

{mercury.temperature}

); } export default Mercury;
